Title: Object: S. Anthonius
Series: Porticus religiosa effigies exhibens patriarcharum uniuscujusque religiosi ordinis
Description: Statue of St Anthony the Great, standing, facing front, looking downwards, wearing cloak embroidered with tau cross, and holding bell in right hand Engraving
Producer name: Print made by: Nicolas Pitau the Elder
Curator's comments: For comment on series see 1862,1108.148. Related sketch by La Hyre in the Cabinet des Dessins, Louvre, inv. 34286.
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
